title: 删除有序数组中的重复项 II (Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array II)
content: 思路: // @Title: 删除有序数组中的重复项 II (Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array II) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-10-13 22:22:53 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 43.4 MB // @comment: // @flag: GREEN class Solution { public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) { int write=0,cur=0,count=0,last=nums[0]; while(cur<nums.length){ if(nums[cur]!=last){ count=0; last=nums[cur]; } if(count<2){ nums[write++]=nums[cur]; } count++; cur++; } return write; } }
